question: How does the variant AURKA Amplification affect response to Alisertib in Esophagus Adenocarcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'AURKA Amplification'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Alisertib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Alisertib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Alisertib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'esophagus' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('L19IL2')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('L19IL2'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('L19IL2')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cisplatin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cisplatin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cisplatin')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'EML4 EML4::ALK Fusion'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acinar' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 T315V'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Axitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Axitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Axitinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'MDM4 Amplification'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Pembrolizumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pembrolizumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pembrolizumab')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: How does the variant FGFR3 FGFR3::TACC3 Fusion affect response to Fexagratinib in Renal Pelvis Transitional Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Fexagratinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fexagratinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fexagratinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'renal' AND

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Gefitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Gefitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Gefitinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'ERBB2 Amplification'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Trastuzumab Deruxtecan')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trastuzumab Deruxtecan'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trastuzumab Deruxtecan')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: How does the variant TSC1 Loss-of-function affect response to MTOR Inhibitor in Renal Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'TSC1 Loss-of-function'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('MTOR Inhibitor')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('MTOR Inhibitor'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('MTOR Inhibitor')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'renal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'EGFR L861Q'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'NPM1 W288FS'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Etoposide')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Etoposide'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Etoposide')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 L384M'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Axitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Axitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Axitinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('RapaLink-1')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('RapaLink-1'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('RapaLink-1')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BRAF V600'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dabrafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dabrafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dabrafenib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'skin' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Axitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Axitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Axitinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Osimertinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Osimertinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Osimertinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Mercaptopurine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Mercaptopurine'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Mercaptopurine')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 V299L'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Nilotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nilotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nilotinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ocular' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'PIK3CA Mutation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Celecoxib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Celecoxib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Celecoxib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'head' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

placeholders.disease_name: Head And Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma
